Title: Friends of Hindley Cemetery
Description: Community group based in Hindley Cemetery, looking after the chapel and hoping to open it to the community in the near future.

Title: Living Faith Church
Description: Living Faith Church meet every Sunday at 10:30am for a service lead by Bishop Steven Lyn Evans.  This service is followed by coffees, teas and treats.  Bishop Steven also speaks on Living Faith Church Facebook Live every Wednesday at 7:30pm, follow our page for more…

Title: Masjid Tooba
Description: The mosque is open to people of all religious affiliations, men and women, and its main prayer halls currently hold upto 300 people during a Friday service, with over 200 worshippers walk through the mosque’s doors during the multiple services held on the religious festivals…

Title: The Salvation Army - Wigan
Description: We aim to be an authentic community with a passion to serve others as and when we can. Our mission statement is .... To Know Christ, To Live Christ, To Share Christ ...... this means we, as Christians, seek to follow the truths found in…

Title: Way
Description: We are diverse and made up of people of all ages. No matter what your background or worldview is, we believe that Jesus is the way to life for everyone.
